mapper.select: SELECT course_id AS courseId, department_id AS deptId, pf_id AS pfId, course_division AS courseDivision, course_name AS courseName, limit_max_count AS limitMaxCount, credit, grade, semester, course_day AS courseDay, course_start_time AS courseStartTime, course_end_time AS courseEndTime, create_date AS createDate FROM subject WHERE grade = #{grade} AND semester = #{semester}
